comments.body: This is exactly what I wanted

Perhaps if you were feeling risky then you could have it so there's another mode where the winner gets to keep one of the losers items. It would make it more competitive for those who want it as well as a risk/reward system built into the game. This would also make the endgame a lot less more dull than it is now. Obviously some enchants and artifacts would have to be for being too overpowered, but with some balancing it could be an amazing and fleshed out feature that could make the endgame way less boring and a lot more fun.
This is genius, I really want this to happen so I can play versus my sister or compete with my friends. definite great idea.
i would love this, because my brother is always saying he would destroy me (he wouldn't) and i would love to prove him wrong.
Very creative. Good idea. Hope this gets added (:

I like how it can only be defeated by the beacons, it adds a sense of uniqueness to the boss and the fact that it summons obsidian golems would make it all the more challenging and fun, and since you would not be able to beat it easily with enchantments like dynamo, that would make the boss actually fun to fight instead of one shotting it
Yes and once you get the obsidian and flint and steel when you go inside the portal you go to the nether dlc! (When it comes out)
Or you might be able to complete the obsidian monstrosity and start the boss fight and after you defeat it it drops items that you can use to light the nether portal.
i think it should be unlocked when you beat the arch illager on apocalipse and it will unlock a new area to the camp in the nether
Please add it so bad because I want to beat the obsidian monstrosity when it gets 100 likes
Please add this level
You should also be able to use at camp to animate/summon target dummies for testing.
I disagree.  The monsters should not be able to help you. If you want a helper/partner play online or get a wolf, lama, or bat.

The mobs should be permeant, but they are no different than the regular enemies. anyway, I would love this! running around with my phantom armor and my three skeleton guards, this is something we need! (It should collect one percent souls as well.)
It should spawn in pumpkin pastures, fiery forge, soggy swamp, highblock halls (court yard), and obsidian pinnacle.

I think they should replace the evoker at the end of pumpkin pastures with a Armored Pillager riding a Ravager. It makes more sense than it just being another evoker, after you fought them for the whole level. It would definitely make pumpkin pastures more exiting.

pillager on back shoots arrows

ravager can ram you, dealing heavy damage

Ravager prioritizes iron golems over the player, as a good way to distract it.

it has as much health as a Redstone Golem, but you have to kill the Pillager too.
Ravagers are coming in howling peaks dlc!
The bread eating sound in Minecraft Dungeons sounds like the bread eating sound in Minecraft yet shortened. Make it as long as the original.
I agree, wanted to put my artifacts to q w e but then it would spam lol

It would be awesome if we could get the ability to disable the quick chat key binds or have the ability to change them on pc. For example, I'd prefer to have my abilities and heal bound to Q, W, E, & R but because one of the quick chats is bound to w and I can't disable that I can't do that. I'd prefer to just have the option to use T to bring up the chat wheel instead of having pre-bound quick chat keys that I can't change and that prevents me from using the layout I want.

 

Please take it into consideration. It would be much appreciated.
In local multiplayer, there are diff. colors for each player. There should be an option to change the colors for P1, P2, P3, and P4, etc.
Err
I think that would be cool.
I would absolutely love this and play dungeons all the time on my mac
We need that why dosent mojang do it. I know microsoft dosn't want people to be on mac but still.
great idea as I was wondering what happened to him after he was saved and if anyone will still accept him
The Arch Illager may be needed in later parts of the story so I don't know if it will be added but I do like it.

Archie would make a great companion, maybe for an end dlc if it ever does happen, I know my friends and many others would enjoy a cute illager friend traveling with us while we slay millions of mobs and open bunches of chests.
Great idea! Archie has no epilogue so this is just flat out PERFECT
Si, seria genial un sistema de skins en minecraft dungeons
Thanks, it would be great! wilber200
That's a great idea, with that we can make skin on Minecraft Dungeons ! üëåüòéüëç

Its a goooood idea...

I play Minecraft dungeons in mobile using xbox cloud gaming and i really want to use custom skins!
This would give creative loving players an objective if it is wanted and a much better way of telling a story because combat in dungeons is much more fun
Ya I want creative mode I hate getting chased by zombies and skeletons and god knows what. Pleese pleese add creative mode please
I think it would ruin the mechanic of minecraft dungeons and turn it into a glorified 3rd person minecraft adventure map
Why does Minecraft dungeons cost money?
thats imposible because of the diferent game engines F

A good idea, but Minecraft and Minecraft Dungeons are definitely not a same game, considering that minecraft dungeons is a dungeon crawler game, the only objective after defeating the boss is getting rare items, and the best part of minecraft dungeons is the feeling you get when you get your weapon/armor/bow/artifact that you want. It would ruin the game experience if you make your own maps to grind for these and the map making is not easy to implement also making the dlc mobs unable to be added because free players can't get dlc only items meaning less people will buy the dlcs
why should people who troll others by lying about difficulty get banned?  You can just tp back to camp.
He should definetely spawn a few little necromancers or smth like that
Yeah and the boss is very lackluster in itself, if you go close and hit it with a fast weapon he can't react and just dies.
Maybe make it so it‚Äôs projectiles do less damage to balance it out as well.
nO. He is hard anyway and took longer than arch illager. Just no

His boss fight was a bit disappointing. I think that he should summon more mobs as well and much more often to make him much harder than the summoner. Also, his green blasts should either follow the player or go through walls to make it harder or make it both but the player can hit them to destroy them. Also something to make the boss fight harder would be that whenever a pet dies, it comes back as an evil version (maybe a skeleton version).
that would make the game way too hard the desert temple is impossible as is
Well, he does do tons of stuff that necromancers can't do.
The game was built around a loot-based system. This would not work well.

That would not work well with the game because how is designed. If they ever add more complex system they should go for new items (like rings, wings and so on) and maybe weapon crafting/boosting, where you would open anvil/blacksmith and a option to insert specific boost item on your gear would open. That way they could give new loot like iron, ruby, diamond, sapphire and other variants of crystals and ingots.
I would love a mage class. Artifacts have faster cooldown, enchantments have a slight power up, melee and ranged weapons do less damage. The class system would make the game feel more personalized.
Like said above, Minecraft Dungeons was meant to be loot-based, allowing for your build/class to be fully customizable at any point of the game.

Mojang actually considered this during development, and also publicly announced their reasons for not adding this. However, a class system such as Terraria's would be pretty cool. (If you haven't played Terraria and don't know what I'm talking about, then please, do yourself a favor and download it on steam for $10 right now)

If you've read "Diary of Steve the Noob", this is basically the classes in the book(eg. Knight, Berserker, Gladiator, Nightwing, Ninja, Theif, Archer, Ranger, Sniper, etc). Minecraft should definitely add these in maybe the 1.20 update, or 1.21, or 1.22, etc.

I feel like there shouldn't be a timer, as it can be very restricting on what you might do

On the other hand, a definite YES for limiting levels.

Demo Could Include:

Levels:

  • Squid Coast
  • Creeper Woods
  • Creepy Crypt
  • Difficulty - Only Default 1 - 7 or a (a = Highest Difficulty Number at the moment)

And if you do decide to buy the game, your data from the demo should pass over to the full version.

Why? Because what if you grind for 10 something hours, and then you have to restart all of that over?

No Weapons, No Armor, No Artifacts, No Levels, Nothing. All of that time and effort wasted.

levels:

  • squid coast
  • creeper woods
  • creepy crypt
  • pumpkin pastures
  • soggy swamp

you would need to buy the full game for arch haven and soggy cave

also data should transfer

For demo: only squid coast and creeper woods

Max player level is 6.

Demo time is 40 minutes.

Your items and player level transfers when you buy the game.
This is a great idea, because I want to check if my PC can run this and I can't check unless if I buy it.
there should be a certain level to stop at like level 5-10
YEAH THEY WOULD BE PERFECT FOR THE OCEAN DLC
That's pretty awesome. I'll really love to see this in-game.
Perhaps it should have a chance to damage the user, for balance.
and if you beat the arch illager his crown will be placed on the orb
I don‚Äôt think so because the story is to destroy the orb, so why would you have it in your house after? Plus wouldn‚Äôt it corrupt people if it was near them?

I support this idea! On so many levels is important to show that it is not vital and necessary to kill every living being (even if it is JUST a game) so you could enjoy 'living' and creating your world! Nevertheless, the game is absolutely fantastically designed and can be used in many forms. We use it in school for various projects and we would like to show kids that DEVELOPERS themselves are letting us know they are thinking empathetically! Kind regards :-) 

Mirta
That would be great, because my nintendo switch only identify Portugal Portuguese and not Brazilian Portuguese, which is my mother language
Word!
pls vote for this!!!
thanks for voting
pretty sure that's Ancient Hunt, you get different level segments and different mobs (like ice mobs in the Nether)
there is already echoing void coming tomorrow

I believe that what determines a boss or mini-boss should depend on the mob's abilities. The reason the drowned necromancer is a mini-boss but not the regular necromancer is because the drowned necromancer has more abilities, so it makes sense to me, even if it sounds a bit strange.
Yup also hoes
*Reuben laughs* Yes
What would the dolphin armour do?
